mapper.select: Select ,ppb.brand_id,ppb.is_ct_code,ppb.product_name,ppb.product_code,ppb.unit_type,ppb.type_id,ppb.brand_id FROM prod_product t left join prod_product_base ppb on t.product_base_id = ppb.product_base_id WHERE t.product_id = #{productId} AND t.is_deleted = '0'

Select ,ppb.unit_type_name AS unitTypeName,pb.name AS brandName,ppb.brand_id,ppb.is_ct_code, ppb.product_name,ppb.product_code,ppb.unit_type,ppb.type_id,pt.type_name,ppb.IS_FIXED_LINE as isFixedLine FROM prod_product t left join prod_product_base ppb on t.product_base_id = ppb.product_base_id left join prod_type pt on pt.type_id = ppb.type_id left join prod_brand pb on pb.brand_id = ppb.brand_id WHERE t.product_id = #{productId} AND t.is_deleted = '0'

select t.*,ppb.product_name,ppb.unit_type_name,pb.name as brand_name,ppb.unit_type,ppb.type_id,pt.type_name from prod_product t left join prod_product_base ppb on t.product_base_id = ppb.product_base_id left join prod_brand pb on pb.brand_id = ppb.brand_id left join prod_type pt on pt.type_id = ppb.type_id where 1 = 1 and t.is_deleted = '0' and ppb.is_deleted = '0' and pb.is_deleted = '0' and pt.is_deleted = '0'
and t.product_id = #{productId}

select t.*,ppb.product_name,ppb.unit_type_name as unitTypeName,pb.name as brand_name,ppb.unit_type,pt.type_name,pt.type_id from prod_product t left join prod_product_base ppb on t.product_base_id = ppb.product_base_id left join prod_brand pb on pb.brand_id = ppb.brand_id left join prod_type pt on pt.type_id = ppb.type_id where 1 = 1 and t.is_deleted = '0'
and t.product_id = #{productId}
Select t.PRODUCT_ID FROM prod_product t left join prod_product_base ppb on t.product_base_id = ppb.product_base_id WHERE t.product_base_id = #{productBaseId} AND t.is_deleted = '0'
Select t.sn, ppb.is_fixed_line, ppb.type_id FROM prod_product t left join prod_product_base ppb on t.product_base_id = ppb.product_base_id WHERE t.product_id = #{productId} AND t.is_deleted = '0'

select a.is_fixed_line from prod_product_base a,prod_product b where a.product_base_id = b.product_base_id and b.sn = #{batchId}

SELECT p.product_id as productId,p.PRODUCT_BASE_ID as productBaseId,p.ATTR_VALUE1 as attrValue1, p.MEMORY as memory,p.COLOR as color,p.CORPORATION_PRICE as corporationPrice,br.`NAME` as brandName, b.UNIT_TYPE_NAME as unitTypeName,b.UNIT_TYPE as unitType ,p.SN as sn,b.PRODUCT_NAME as productName, CASE WHEN p.PURCHASE_TYPE ='1' THEN '集采' WHEN p.PURCHASE_TYPE ='2' THEN '社采' END as purType from prod_product p LEFT JOIN prod_product_base b on b.PRODUCT_BASE_ID=p.PRODUCT_BASE_ID LEFT JOIN prod_brand br ON b.BRAND_ID = br.BRAND_ID WHERE p.PRODUCT_ID=#{productId}
